dct_title_s: Carte réduite des parties septentrionales du globe, situées entre l'Asie et l'Amerique : pour servir à l'Histoire generale des voyages
dct_description_sm: Map showing east coast and small portion of west coast of North America, and portion of east coast of Russia; relief shown pictorially. In lower margin: Tome XV, no. 4. From: Histoire générale des voyages ... Paris : Didot, 1746-1789.
